plot: A 30-year-old American woman enters a teenage party in the South of France. Some of the guests wonder who she is and what she is doing there.
title: Social Butterfly
plot_es: A 30-year-old American woman enters a teenage party in the South of France. Some of the guests wonder who she is and what she is doing there.
plot_en: A 30-year-old American woman enters a teenage party in the South of France. Some of the guests wonder who she is and what she is doing there.
